channel.title: Can someone make me a background for my webclient please
channel.description:
I need a good background for my new rsps. I don't want the server name on it, i just want it to be creative :P I'm going to put it as the background on the basic rspscoding.org webclient Thanks! [I'd prefer a black background, with neon green text saying: RSantiEOC] [If it's not too much to ask, please make some rs pictures on it. For example: A white partyhat and a pker] [If i didn't request this properly i am very sorry but i'm new to hosting a rsps, and feel free to yell at me and i will change :P]
-Matthew

item.title: Can someone make me a background for my webclient please
item.dc:creator: @l_Shadow_l l Shadow l
item.description:
@l_Shadow_l wrote:

It’s awesome Thank you so much

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone make me a background for my webclient please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“l Shadow l, post:7, topic:475989”]This is what the current one is: http://www.rspscoding.org/webclient/images/webclient_bg.png
it says it’s 766x503[/quote]
Sorry I haven’t tried yet. Busy with this website and all. I’ll get back to ya once I can make an attempt
EDIT:
This good? I made it in like 2 mins.

8GER8.png766×503

item.title: Can someone make me a background for my webclient please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“l Shadow l, post:5, topic:475989”]Oh i understand man, i should of read how to post before doing that. I’m sorry.
If you can, -put server name in Bold, Neon letters.
-Black background
-Blue Party hat picture on the left
-White Party hat picture on the right

I can’t really think at the moment, but that should be good Thanks if you can[/quote]
How big is the client picture? Lol I haven’t edited one in ages.

item.title: Can someone make me a background for my webclient please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“l Shadow l, post:3, topic:475989”]tbh it’s better than what i can make thanks but i’m not going to use that one. Can some else make me one? i mean if you rather put the server name, put: RSantiEOC

sorry i’m being a little picky

-Matthew[/quote]
I did that because you aren’t giving us ANY information.
Color Schemes?
Images?
Anything?
Creativity isn’t just something we have. We need to know what we are working with.
